titles.title: To require Community Development Block Grant and Surface Transportation Block Grant recipients to develop a strategy to support inclusive zoning policies, to allow for a credit to support housing affordability, and for other purposes.
Housing, Opportunity, Mobility, and Equity Act of 2019
Housing, Opportunity, Mobility, and Equity Act of 2019
Housing, Opportunity, Mobility, and Equity Act of 2019

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Ways and Means, and in addition to the Committees on Financial Services, and Transportation and Infrastructure, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
